meanings.definition: The act of entrusting someone with something.
meanings.sent1: The entrustment of the key to the safe was a big decision.
meanings.sent2: She felt honored by the entrustment of her friend's precious necklace.
meanings.sent3: The entrustment of the class hamster to the forgetful student was a risky move.
meanings.sent4: His entrustment of the secret to her was like handing over his heart.
meanings.sent5: The entrustment of the ancient artifact to the museum was a momentous occasion.

meanings.definition: The responsibility or duty of taking care of something that has been entrusted to you.
meanings.sent1: He took his entrustment of the family heirloom very seriously.
meanings.sent2: The entrustment of the project to her was a sign of trust from the boss.
meanings.sent3: The entrustment of the cookies to the cookie monster was a risky move.
meanings.sent4: Her entrustment of the secret recipe to him was a leap of faith.
meanings.sent5: The entrustment of the keys to the new house was a symbol of their commitment.
